newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: SNB says it is more generous on money market.
newsitem.headline: SNB says it is more generous on money market.

text.p: The Swiss National Bank has been "even more generous" in providing liquidity to the Swiss money market since yesterday, a spokesman for the central bank said.
"We continue our policy of flexibly meeting the deamnds of banks on the money market. We have been even more generous since yesterday," the spokesman told Reuters.
He declined to elaborate, in keeping with an SNB policy of not publically detailing its money market moves.
Overnight Swiss francs were quoted at 2.25/2.63 before the SNB statement.
Tomorrow-next was quoted at 2.45/2.60 percent and then 2.42/2.55 shortly after the SNB statement.
The Swiss National Bank has made efforts in recent weeks to offset upward pressure on money market rates.
